question: What is the best way for Partners to “Spot the Fakes?”

options.text: Always check inside coolers and other items Customers are purchasing
Always move large items in shopping carts to ensure nothing is hidden underneath
When shoplifters push managers who try to stop them from stealing
When a shoplifter pushes out a basket of unpaid merchandise
When a shoplifter runs out the door

question: Staying alert and paying attention to what’s in-side shopping carts reduces loss: True or False?
Which of the following behaviors might be con-sidered suspicious?

options.text: A shopping cart lined with bags of dog food, with a weekly ad covering the middle of the cart
An entire shopping cart full of Tide detergent
A Customer who spends more time watching Partners than looking for merchandise

question: When is it permissible for a Partner to touch a shoplifter?

options.text: If shoplift attempts to leave before the Police arrive
When merchandise is concealed in their clothing
When a shoplifter looks like they are about to run
